entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
